programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Chris Souster is an Attorney by day and a boxing coach by night. He sees the similarities between disputes in the courtroom and fighting in the ring. Today we get a perspective on what his coaching day looks like and the knowledge he shares with his MMA fighters.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Coaches in fight sport are at times an underrated but yet intergral part of an athlete's success. What makes them give up their day, weeks and years to help their fighters be the best in the world? This episode features Josh Hopkins as we delve into the life of a coach.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Transitioning from a professional ballet dancer to an MMA fighter and coach bring some interesting insights and tricks other athletes might not be aware of. Anthony Ford has a ""method to his madness"" when he trains other fighters.

programme.title: OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.desc: Louie Grover drew inspiration at a young age from watching karate movies, and began taking lessons at age 9. After a year off to complete his recovery from a broken arm, Louie makes his pro debut at HK36, in an exhilerating match against Jason Rodych.

programme.title: OUT OF THE CAGE

programme.desc: Out of the Cage reveals the private thoughts and emotions of a fight sport athlete, the ambition that drives them and how they are affected when encountering defeat or facing triumph. Featuring Zack Blanchard.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: In a showdown between the winners from Series 1 and the powerhouse Russian Red Devils, Mario Rinaldi is in tough against Sergey Kaznovski. The Russian is reknowned for short, brutal fights, earning him a reputation as the king of the 1st round KO. This is not the first time Trevor Pragley and Andrei Semenov have met in the ring. Last time, Semenov was battered into submission, so he come into this fight hungry for revenge.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Fabricio Santos De Jesus was introduced to Judo as a child while he was still living in Brazil. He was also introduced to Capoeira, becoming Champion of Brazil and International Capoeira Champion. He has been able to transfer his knowledge of the control of movement and is now recognized for this knowledge as a coach in MMA community. Hard Knocks Fighter Jess Elverum, among others, using his teachings to expand their flexibility and dexterity, becoming more fluid and calm in movement.

programme.title: Kedarnath
programme.desc: In the holy town of Kedarnath, a Muslim boy Mansoor drops pilgrims to their destinations as a porter while Mandakini, a high caste Brahmin girl, is engaged to marry a boy of the same caste. Faith brings the two together, but religion creates a barrier. Mandakini attempts suicide on the day of her marriage but is saved. Mansoor promises to take her out of the valley once she recovers. Mandakini's husband plans to kill Mansoor and drive his community out of the valley. But fatal floods strike, leaving everyone's lives in danger.

programme.title: Ab Tumhare Hawale Watan Saathiyo
programme.desc: Major General Amarjeet Singh (Amitabh Bachchan) is a dedicated officer for the Indian army. His son Lieutenant Commander Vikramjeet Singh (Bobby Deol) follows in his footsteps and joins the army. Amarjeet is extremely proud of Vikramjeet but tragedy strikes when Vikramjeet is killed in action. Many years pass, Vikramjeet's son Captain Kunal Singh (Bobby Deol) joins the army but has no intentions of remaining there. He instead plans to leave, settle abroad and earn lots of money. Amarjeet is disappointed with Kunal as he hopes his grandson would do something to honour his deceased father. Kunal comes across a desert party and sees Shweta Bhansali (Divya Khosla). It is love at first sight...

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Pal Pal Dil Ke Paas
programme.desc: Orphaned at a young age, Karan Sehgal owns 'Camp Ujhi,' an elite trekking club in Manali. Saher Sethi, a top vlogger, takes up an assignment to review the camp to avoid a family reunion. Suspecting a scam due to high prices, she aims to expose it, but Karan promises a life-changing experience. After a week of thrilling adventures, they fall for each other. Just as everything seems perfect, Saher's ex-boyfriend appears, intent on separating them.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E60 Jodha Akbar S3 E60
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: Article 15
programme.desc: In the village of Lalgaon, two Dalit girls are abducted from a school bus. IPS officer Ayan Ranjan is assigned to the case and works closely with officers Brahmdutt and Jatav. As Ayan investigates, he discovers that deep-rooted caste discrimination prevails among the villagers. He reconnects with an old friend, Satinder, who behaves oddly and mysteriously goes missing the next morning. Soon after, the bodies of the two girls are found hanging from a tree, while a third girl remains missing. The autopsy reveals that the victims were raped multiple times. Gaura, the sister of one of the deceased girls, informs Ayan that they were slapped by their employer, Anshu, for demanding a raise of...

programme.desc: The story revolves around the two sisters of Pragya, from Kumkum Bhagya. Her sisters are Preeta and Shristhi who discover the existence of their mother Sarla and sister Pragya, after their father’s death. The sisters try to unite with their mother and sister.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Guddan
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E271 Undercover Love S1 E271
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Maitree
programme.sub-title: S01 : E25 Maitree: The Rules of Love S1 E25
programme.desc: The lives of three friends, Nandini, Maitree and Ashish get inexplicably intertwined when an accident brings unexpected changes in their lives.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E271 King of Hearts S1 E271
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E271 Second Chances S1 E271
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E65 Jodha Akbar S3 E65
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: Playful Kiss
programme.desc: Oh Ha Ni has a big crush on Baek Seung Jo, the smartest and most popular boy in Parang High School.

programme.title: Playful Kiss
programme.desc: Seung Jo's parents welcome Ha Ni but Seung Jo and his little brother Eun Jo are cold to her.

programme.title: Playful Kiss
programme.desc: Class 7 and 1 are having the physical tournament. Ha Ni and Seung Jo participate in the relay race.

programme.title: Playful Kiss
programme.desc: As word spreads that Ha Ni and Seung Jo live together all over the school, Seung Jo gets angry.

programme.title: Playful Kiss
programme.desc: Seung Jo announces that he won't take SAT and Ha Ni tries to persuade him.

programme.title: Playful Kiss
programme.desc: Ha Ni blames herself for making Seung Jo miss the interview but Seung Jo shows her something.

programme.title: Playful Kiss
programme.desc: Ha Ni is jealous when Hae Ra who entered Parang University as the second best approaches Seung Jo.

programme.title: Playful Kiss
programme.desc: Ha Ni's family moves to a new house and the quiet house without Ha Ni is strange to Seung Jo.

programme.title: Playful Kiss
programme.desc: Seung Jo asks Ha Ni where she wants to go and it's like a dream for Ha Ni to be with him.

programme.title: Playful Kiss
programme.desc: After Seung Jo moves out of his house, Ha Ni is almost beside herself longing for him.

programme.title: Playful Kiss
programme.desc: Tennis club Sunbae Kim Gi Tae asks Ha Ni out but Seung Jo seems uninterested.

programme.title: Playful Kiss
programme.desc: Sensing a loneliness from Seung Jo, Ha Ni tells him to get it out.

programme.title: Playful Kiss
programme.desc: Seung Jo gets surprised when he finds out that Hae Ra is his prospective marriage partner.

programme.title: Playful Kiss
programme.desc: Realizing how they feel about each other, Seung Jo and Ha Ni decide to get married after graduation.

programme.title: Playful Kiss
programme.desc: Seung Jo and Ha Ni are extremely busy to prepare for their unexpected wedding.

programme.title: Playful Kiss
programme.desc: Ha Ni studies hard for the test to change her major, which determines their marriage registeration.

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.desc: Eun Ha Won, a modern day Cinderella girl, accepts a special part-time job for her college tuition fees.

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.desc: CEO Kang offers Eun Ha Won a project to reform his grandsons in exchange for her educational support.

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.desc: Eun Ha Won starts living in Haneul House with Kang Hyeon Min, Kang Ji Woon, and Kang Seo Woo.

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.desc: Eun Ha Won’s first mission is to make the three grandsons have a meal together but it is not easy.

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.desc: Kang Ji Woon’s announcement bothers Eun Ha Won. While doing her second mission, she hears Kang family’s story.

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.desc: During her graduation ceremony, Eun Ha Won gets into trouble. Who would be coming to save her?

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.desc: After coming back to Haneul House, Eun Ha Won’s new mission is to go on vacation all together.

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.desc: On vacation, love relationship gets more complicated. What happened between Eun Ha Won and Kang Ji Woon?

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.desc: After coming back from vacation, Park Hye Ji gets hurt by Kang Hyeon Min and goes to Kang Ji Woon.

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.desc: Kang Ji Woon and Eun Ha Won takes a drive together. However, Kang Ji Woon gets an urgent call from someone.

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.desc: Park Hye Ji’s enter to Haneul House makes Eun Ha Won kind of nervous. Hye Ji’s lie badly disappoints Ha Won.

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.desc: The shocking news strikes Eun Ha Won. Kang Ji Woon comforts her, but she is not sure what his real heart is.

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.desc: Eun Ha Won and Kang Ji Woon finally starts dating but has to keep it secret because of CEO Kang’s rule.

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.desc: Kang Ji Woon discovers the truth of his parents and leaves Haneul House. Eun Ha Won tries to convince him.

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.desc: Kang Ji Woon decides to get a surgery for CEO Kang which also can put his life in danger.

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.desc: Eun Ha Won pleads to take care of unconscious Kang Ji Woon but CEO Kang is stiff. Would there be happy ending?

programme.title: If You Wish Upon Me
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 If You Wish Upon Me
programme.desc: Tae Sik and Yeon Ju meet Gyeo Re while fulfilling the final wish of the dying ex-captain of Team Genie.

programme.title: If You Wish Upon Me
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 If You Wish Upon Me
programme.desc: Gyeo Re becomes Team Genie's new ambulance driver, and they receive their first patient Mr. Pyeon.

programme.title: If You Wish Upon Me
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 If You Wish Upon Me
programme.desc: Gyeo Re is touched by Mr. Pyeon's family, while Tae Sik works to fulfill the dream of a young cancer patient.

programme.title: If You Wish Upon Me
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 If You Wish Upon Me
programme.desc: Preparations for Se Hee's musical commence, despite Tae Sik failing to convince Gyu Tae.

programme.title: If You Wish Upon Me
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 If You Wish Upon Me
programme.desc: Se Hee's final wish of a musical is granted, bringing loved ones together and helping Gyu Tae make amends.

programme.title: If You Wish Upon Me
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 If You Wish Upon Me
programme.desc: Wanting to fulfill her boyfriend's final wish, Seo Jin enlists Gyeo Re to help her.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Jae In finds out that his grandfather revised his will and the inheritance condition is to marry Da Hyeon.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Da Hyeon can't trust Jae In, and she is not interested in marriage. So, he makes a new suggestion to her.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Jae In and Da Hyeon sign a contract to date for six months. But they are so different to date each other.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Da Hyeon finds out Jae In's colorful history of dating and she got angry as she remembers the kiss with him.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Da Hyeon heard Jae In said Da Hyeon is not special. Da Hyeon, who got hurt in pride, prepares to revenge.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: An urgent matter comes up to Jae In and Da Hyeon waits for him. They missed each other as their paths crossed.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: On Jae In's birthday, Da Hyeon prepares a special gift. Meanwhile, a man approaches Da Hyeon.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Da Hyeon's house was robbed. Jae In is anxious to leave her alone, he brings her to his house.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Da Hyeon attend Jae In's event and she meets Ju Hee, who was almost engaged with Jae In.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Jae In had a scandal with Ju Hee while the termination date of his contract with Da Hyeon is getting closer.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Da Hyeon has decided to attend the group’s anniversary event to meet Jae In’s grandfather.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Ju Hee is jealous at Jae In's love for Da Hyeon. She plans to separate Da Hyeon from Jae In.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Ju Hee visits Da Hyeon and apologizes for the kidnapping, but Da Hyeon still suffers from the after-effects.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Jae In, who suddenly took over the company, naturally moved away from Da Hyeon, and they miss each other.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Jae In tries to forget Da Hyeon, but he runs to Da Hyeon's house after seeing Da Hyeon meeting another man.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Jae In proposed to Da Hyeon, married after many twists and turns and lived happily as a married couple.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: A rich playboy Jin Wook starts work in his father's resort as a bellhop. He keeps encounter Yoo Mi.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: After spending a night with Jin Wook, Yoo Mi run away from him. 3 years later, she becomes a nutritionist.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Yoo Mi struggles to meet the unreasonable demands of her boss.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Yoo Mi brings a meal to Jin Wook’s office and she encounters him with Hye Ri. Hye Ri is jealous of Yoo Mi.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Yoo Mi takes Dong Goo to Jin Wook’s house and Dong Goo accidentally breaks an expensive jewelry box.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Jin Wook makes Yoo Mi work overtime to prevent Yoo Mi from spending time together with Hyeon Tae.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Yoo Mi agrees to pay for the jewelry box and medical fees by having dinner with Jin Wook ten times.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Yoo Mi goes to Jin Wook’s house to cook a meal and just about to sit down to eat, Jin Wook’s father drops by.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Yoo Mi and Jin Wook stay at one of the company’s resorts. Meanwhile, in Seoul, Hye Ri visits Hyeon Tae.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: When Dae Bok sees Jin Wook playing with Dong Goo, he thinks that Yoo Mi and Jin Wook had a child.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Hye Ri harasses Yoo Mi. Meanwhile, Dae Bok visits Yoo Mi’s home to find out if Dong Goo is his grandchild.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: After she quits her job, Yoo Mi moves to Daejeon to work at a university. Hyeon Tae comes to visit her.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Yoo Mi blames her mom for her misfortune and goes to the beach where she first met Jin Wook.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Estes imprisons the captive talkers and blends, while Warren and George plan their attack on Altura.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren works with humans, talkers and blends to help George defeat Estes and Pandora. Newmericans can finally vote, but before Warren can relax, Cooper reappears with a shocking revelation.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of gas, the team follows a suspicious stranger to a damaged oil refinery deep inside a New Jersey no-go zone packed with zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Out to get Cassandra back, her bizarre and dangerous "family" of cannibals catches up with the team and kidnaps Addy, endangering the mission.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Citizen Z directs the team to a rumored helicopter controlled by a mysterious general living atop a heavily guarded skyscraper - where zombies roam freely.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A tornado forces the team to Warren's hometown, where she searches for her husband who she lost track of in the early days of the apocalypse.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lost and out of water in rural Kansas, the team is on the verge of breaking up before arriving at a Wild West-style bar. Guns, liquor and a zombie-shooting contest: what could go wrong?

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When the last surviving cosmonaut from the International Space Station crashes on Earth, Citizen Z gets a real, live buddy - but it quickly becomes clear that his new friend has a secret agenda.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Split off from the others, Mack and Addy find themselves trapped by a zombie they just can't kill. A series of escalating fights forces them to confront an ugly truth hidden in their past.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While in South Dakota, an imminent meltdown forces the team to help the locals repair a nearby nuclear power plant full of radiated zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Some strangers earn their ways into the team, taking a keen interest in Murphy, but things take a deadly turn.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A change in plans has the team re-routed to a Colorado viral lab located in a nuclear missile silo. The team searches for Dr. Merch, the developer of the experimental vaccine previously given to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Picking up moments after the launch of the tactical nuclear weapons, the team is split up trying to outrun the impending blast. Citizen Z finds himself battling thawed zombies, ultimately issuing an on-air bounty for Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Each member of the group goes through a near-death experience while being attacked by bounty hunters. Mack is bitten after being caught in a zombie-infested stairwell.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: On the quest for a cure for the virus, the group makes its way to the greenhouse where Batch 47 is being grown by Odegard. There, Odegard warns them about zombie-plant hybrids.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy's past comes back to haunt him when Serena tracks him down. The team stumbles upon a hidden farm.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy separates from the group out of fear that they may take the baby away - and kill her. Vasquez and Warren are injured and wind up in an abandoned hospital. 10K is forced to make a tragic decision during a conflict with Cassandra.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While crossing the Mississippi River, the group is involved in an accident and 10K is separated. At a nearby settlement, 10K and some new friends run into trouble with the settlement's leader, Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Tricked into a trap by use of a fresh brain lure, Murphy is captured by a zombie fan known as "The Collector."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy, Warren, Vasquez and Addy find themselves at a casino while 10K and Doc are captured by Natives.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group becomes embroiled in corporate politics while seeking shelter at a hotel overtaken by white-collar survivors. There, Murphy is hunted.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near the Mexican border, the group is rescued from a zombie hoard by Escorpion, who leads them to La Reina, the "Queen of the Dead." As a bounty for Murphy, La Reina offers them a reward or a free pass to join her group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose when it's discovered that not only does Dr. Kurian's vaccine not work but everyone who was injected will come under Murphy's control after an incubation period.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, the team drives through the abandoned city to the coordinates of the mobile CDC lab provided by Citizen Z. There, they discover the lab isn't just a lab - it's a submarine.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 1.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 2.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group are taken prisoner while Murphy manages to escape with his newly formed group of blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: As more people flock to Murphy's new cult, Dr. Merch works on a blend vaccine as well as a booster shot to slow to Murphy's descent into zombiedom.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Alone and suffering from the effects of Merch's booster, 10K barely escapes Murphy and is stalked by a blend.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc finds himself taken captive by a psychotic nurse and her surviving mental patients, and he later discovers that 10K is being held too.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Seemingly injected with the blend vaccine, The Man attempts to kidnap Murphy but underestimates the strength of Murphy's followers. However, he does manage to learn about Lucy's existence. 10K reunites with the group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Looking for Lucy, Doc and Addy run into Skeezy and Sketch, who is running for "President of the Apocalypse."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Upon finding Lucy, Doc and Addy work hard to stay alive and earn the family's trust. After a dangerous game of zombie hide-and-seek, an apocalyptic fairytale and a close call with an ender, Addy and Doc convince the family to follow them to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc tries to find a way to tell Warren about Lucy's kidnapping. In the meantime, he encounters a radio tower and castle-like compound inhabited by three attractive, crafty ladies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren leads an attack against Murphytown to extract its smug leader.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy is being pummeled with whatever The Man can throw at her - and Lucy does the same right back.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Two years later, things have gotten worse: Warren's apocalyptic dreams continue while the group fights MAD-Zs.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Driven by her dream of a black rainbow and flesh-eating rain, Warren and Murphy escape Zona, while Doc, 10K and Sarge are pinned down by snipers.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When Sun Mei and Red vanish, the group must decide whether to keep looking for them or press on to Newmerica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following Warren's dream, the team doesn't stop while crossing the Great Pile, a seemingly endless landscape of rubble and destruction.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lucy fights to save Murphy's life, while Warren and the others battle a biologically modified zombie.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Shaken by the death a groupmate, something snaps in Murphy. Warren is unable to stop him and the others from committing an atrocity as misplaced revenge.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group encounter a mysterious stranger who they think is a grave robber - but turns out to be something much more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group explores an abandoned TV station while seeking a way to contact Kaya, who is attempting to hide from an invasion of Zona forces at camp Northern Light. Citizen Z returns home after two years.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group returns to Mercy Labs, where they first met The Man, to retrieve another item from Warren's dreams.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: At Mount Weather, the group learns the thumb print of the president is necessary to achieve Warren's goal.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the mind-bending season finale, the team arrives in Washington, D.C. and the secret of Warren's dreams is revealed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following the drone crash, Warren is nursed back to health by attractive homesteader Cooper. Meanwhile, the others finally reach Newmerica, and Murphy goes his own way.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the outpost Altura, 10K searches for Red, Warren discovers George is an old friend, Murphy encounters Sun Mei in her new lab and Doc runs into Citizen Z.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: 10K and Red attend a ceremony for those lost in Altura. Warren, Doc, Citizen Z and George arrive in Pacifica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A new spate of terrorist bombings hit Pacifica. In order to follow his vision for human-talker unity, George seeks those responsible for the attacks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group wind up at a wild casino and shelter for fugitive talkers run by Murphy and his blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc breaks out special medicine to treat George's injury and explains the Founding Fathers, the Bill of Rights and more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group is reunited with old Native friends who are defending a dam that controls Newmerica's water from talkers. In order to help, Doc and Warren undertake spiritual journeys.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group discovers Altura militia forces have enslaved talkers to mine hazardous waste for Z-bizkuits.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: With help from renegade hackers, Warren and George hack Altura's defenses and discover Estes' secret plan.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Estes imprisons the captive talkers and blends, while Warren and George plan their attack on Altura.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A team starts its journey transporting the only survivor of the zombie virus from New York to Los Angeles, CA.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of gas, the team follows a suspicious stranger to a damaged oil refinery deep inside a New Jersey no-go zone packed with zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Out to get Cassandra back, her bizarre and dangerous "family" of cannibals catches up with the team and kidnaps Addy, endangering the mission.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Citizen Z directs the team to a rumored helicopter controlled by a mysterious general living atop a heavily guarded skyscraper - where zombies roam freely.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After taking refuge in a safe enclave where no weapons are allowed, the team finds itself thrust into a battle for control of the compound against a zombie-worshipping cult.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lost and out of water in rural Kansas, the team is on the verge of breaking up before arriving at a Wild West-style bar. Guns, liquor and a zombie-shooting contest: what could go wrong?

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When the last surviving cosmonaut from the International Space Station crashes on Earth, Citizen Z gets a real, live buddy - but it quickly becomes clear that his new friend has a secret agenda.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Split off from the others, Mack and Addy find themselves trapped by a zombie they just can't kill. A series of escalating fights forces them to confront an ugly truth hidden in their past.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of shelter and supplies, the team seeks refuge in an all-female compound where men are not allowed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Some strangers earn their ways into the team, taking a keen interest in Murphy, but things take a deadly turn.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A change in plans has the team re-routed to a Colorado viral lab located in a nuclear missile silo. The team searches for Dr. Merch, the developer of the experimental vaccine previously given to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Picking up moments after the launch of the tactical nuclear weapons, the team is split up trying to outrun the impending blast. Citizen Z finds himself battling thawed zombies, ultimately issuing an on-air bounty for Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After finally tracking down Murphy, the group comes across a caravan of survivors transporting victims of the nuclear blast to safety. Along the way, the mission is attacked by "blasters," zombies mutated by the radioactive fallout.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: On the quest for a cure for the virus, the group makes its way to the greenhouse where Batch 47 is being grown by Odegard. There, Odegard warns them about zombie-plant hybrids.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy's past comes back to haunt him when Serena tracks him down. The team stumbles upon a hidden farm.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy separates from the group out of fear that they may take the baby away - and kill her. Vasquez and Warren are injured and wind up in an abandoned hospital. 10K is forced to make a tragic decision during a conflict with Cassandra.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Tricked into a trap by use of a fresh brain lure, Murphy is captured by a zombie fan known as "The Collector."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near Roswell, New Mexico, the group encounters a community, led by a woman called Bernadette, which they believe is above a secret underground base that may contain useful equipment.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy, Warren, Vasquez and Addy find themselves at a casino while 10K and Doc are captured by Natives.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group becomes embroiled in corporate politics while seeking shelter at a hotel overtaken by white-collar survivors. There, Murphy is hunted.

programme.title: Przeżegnaj się Nieznajomy
programme.desc: Łowca nagród chce schwytać bandytę imieniem Carson, ponieważ jego gang jest wart dużo pieniędzy.

programme.title: Zimny Zabójca
programme.desc: José Desman zabija swojego pracodawcę, pana Salazara, byłego sędziego, który skazał jego ojca na śmierć.

programme.title: Trumna Dla Szeryfa
programme.desc: Anthony Steffen wciela się w rolę Shenandoah, człowieka zagadki, który dołącza do złowrogiej bandy rozbójników po przejściu niemal niemożliwej do wykonania i wymagającej śmierci inicjacji.

programme.title: Apache Rose
programme.desc: Roy jest poszukiwaczem ropy naftowej. Stara się uzyskać prawa do odwiertów na starej hiszpańskiej hacjendzie. Roy wpada w konflikt z szajką hazardzistów z pływającego kasyna, którzy są zdeterminowani, by przejąć hacjendę.

programme.title: Gdzie Śmierć Zbiera Żniwo
programme.desc: Dwie nienawidzące się rodziny od zawsze spędzają czas na wzajemnym zabijaniu się. Córka z rodziny Campos i syn z rodziny Mounter zakochują się w sobie - końca nienawiści nie widać.

programme.title: Twardziel z Arizony
programme.desc: Marshal Matt Landry pojmuje bandytę Girarda, lecz jego bracia odbijają go i napadają na dyliżans ze srebrem. Dzięki telegramom i zeznaniom dziewczyny Girarda Landry odkrywa zdradę telegrafisty, który miał być martwy. Znając kryjówkę gangu, rusza w pościg, by wymierzyć sprawiedliwość.

programme.title: Dni Przemocy
programme.desc: W ostatnich miesiącach wojny secesyjnej brat Joego zostaje niesprawiedliwie zabity przez Clifforda, kapitana armii północnej. Joe postanawia dołączyć do grupy południowców zdeterminowanych, by stawiać opór do końca.

programme.title: Kolej Canadian Pacific
programme.desc: Tom Andrews odkrywa przejście przez Góry Skaliste dla kolei, lecz handlarz futrami Rourke sabotuje budowę i rywalizuje o Cecille. Tom zostaje ranny przez sabotaż, ratuje go transfuzja. Cecille odkrywa zdradę ojca i konfrontuje Rourke’a, uciekając przed nim.

programme.title: Tropiciele
programme.desc: Jeff poprzysięga zemstę na pięciu bandytach, którzy zniszczyli życie jego siostry. Każdemu z nich zostawia ślad – fragment jej poncza. Brutalna, intensywna historia o bólu, sprawiedliwości i determinacji.

programme.title: Kasztanek
programme.desc: Chłopiec z rancza dostaje kucyka. Chłopiec go kocha, ale ten ucieka. Zaczyna się niespodziewana i tragiczna w skutkach historia.

programme.title: Apaczka
programme.desc: Tommy jest niewinnym oficerem kawalerii, który zakochuje się w pięknej kobiecie Apaczów (Yara Kewa) po uratowaniu jej od paskudnego przemytnika broni o imieniu Honest Jeremy.

programme.title: Doktor Złote Ręce
programme.desc: Były chirurg Doc McGregor jest teraz karciarzem. Zostaje niesłusznie oskarżony o morderstwo i ścigany przez Slade'a, łowcę nagród.

programme.title: Nieokiełznany
programme.desc: Po zabójstwie ojca, agenta federalnego, młody prawnik Mitch Baker jedzie do Mission w Teksasie, by odnaleźć zabójców. Trop prowadzi do gangu przemytników broni. Mimo ostrzeżeń szeryfa, Mitch działa sam, a w Mission spotyka Angelitę, która budzi w nim uczucia i nadzieję.

programme.title: Piętnaście Stryczków Dla Mordercy
programme.desc: Oskarżeni o ohydną zbrodnię, której nie popełnili, członkowie dwóch rywalizujących ze sobą gangów uciekają przez rozwścieczonym tłumem. Chronią się w opuszczonym forcie, biorąc wcześniej dwóch zakładników.

programme.title: Udanego Pogrzebu, Przyjacielu... Sartana Zapłaci
programme.desc: Legendarny bohater Sartana jest świadkiem brutalnej masakry. Jest gotów przeprowadzić śledztwo. Prawie wszyscy w maleńkim miasteczku Indian Creek zdają się chętni do wykupienia posiadłości ofiar morderstwa...

programme.title: Może Bóg ci wybaczy... lecz nie ja
programme.desc: Kiedy Cjamango jest z dala od swojego rancza, sześciu bandytów atakuje i zabija wszystkich członków jego rodziny.

programme.title: Jeden po Drugim
programme.desc: Na granicy Teksasu i Meksyku, podczas wojny secesyjnej, pułkownik Greyson został oskarżony o zdefraudowanie 500 000 dolarów, które miał dostarczyć dowództwu Konfederacji.

programme.title: Trzy Dolary Ołowiu
programme.desc: Rudy wraca do domu, by zemścić się za śmierć ojca, którego zabili miejscowi bandyci.

programme.title: Kula Dla Generała
programme.desc: Banda meksykańskich handlarzy bronią, zatrudnionych przez rewolucyjnego generała, przyjmuje do swojego gangu Amerykanina, nie wiedząc o jego intencjach.

programme.title: Zabójcy z Dakoty
programme.desc: Ranczer Ed Sampson chce pozbyć się osadników i zleca podpalenie domu Martinów. Ginie ojciec, a syn Joe trafia na drogę zemsty. Emerytowany rewolwerowiec Ned East ratuje go przed prowokacją Beckera. Sampson zatrudnia Clinta Jonesa do zastraszania Squattersów, lecz ten ratując narzeczone z napadu, sam zaczyna pożądać wybranki Joe.

programme.title: Krwawa Dziewiątka
programme.desc: Oddział kawalerii zostaje wybity w zasadzce, ocala jedynie sierżant z córką i siedmiu brutalnych więźniów. Bez koni i wagonu muszą przedzierać się przez góry. Sierżant staje przed desperackim zadaniem: doprowadzić skazańców do więzienia, chronić córkę i odkryć, który z nich zabił jego żonę.

programme.title: Nieznajomy w Paso Bravo
programme.desc: Drifter powraca do małego miasteczka, by pomścić morderstwo żony i córki.

programme.title: Legenda o samotnym jeźdźcu
programme.desc: Młody Strażnik Teksasu John Reid jako jedyny przeżywa zasadzkę zorganizowaną przez przywódcę renegatów Bartholomew "Butcha" Cavendisha. Przeżyć pomaga mu stary przyjaciel z dzieciństwa Komancz Tonto. Kiedy John dojdzie do siebie i wyliże rany, poświęci życie walce z przestępczością. John Reid stanie się zamaskowanym bohaterem zachodu, Samotnym Jeźdźcem. Z pomocą Tonto dwójka bohaterów wyrusza na ratunek prezydentowi Ulyssesowi S. Grantowi, gdy Cavendish bierze go za zakładnika. Dowiadujemy się, że Cavendish był oficerem w armii Stanów Zjednoczonych, zanim stanął przed sądem wojennym i został niehonorowo zwolniony.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 46, 47
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Dorwać Chaco
programme.desc: Chaco to Meksykanin, który zdaje się uciekać przed każdym. Zostaje oskarżony o morderstwo paru bydlaków.

programme.title: Zasadzka
programme.desc: W 1866 roku agent James Barlow przenika do gangu braci Reno, terroryzującego Seymour w Indianie. Udając przestępcę, zdobywa ich zaufanie, lecz zakochuje się w Laurze Reno, siostrze bandytów. Konflikt lojalności i przygotowywany napad na pociąg prowadzą do dramatycznego finału.

programme.title: Pojedynek Kogutów
programme.desc: Dwóch oszustów niszczy lokalną gospodarkę małego miasteczka, które odwiedzają... ale potem zakochują się w dwóch młodych kobietach spokrewnionych z bogatymi właścicielami ziemskimi, którzy są celem ich głównego oszustwa.

programme.title: Cjamango
programme.desc: Kiedy Cjamango wygrywa w pokera worek złota, gangi El Tigre i Don Pablo atakują go. Podczas leczenia ran, Cjamango zaprzyjaźnia się z meksykańskim chłopcem Manuelem i piękną dziewczyną, Perlą.

programme.title: Siedzący Byk
programme.desc: Siedzący Byk, wódz plemienia Siuksów, zostaje sprowokowany przez generała Custera do walki, co prowadzi do słynnej bitwy pod Little Bighorn. Oficer Parrish, przyjaciel Indian, stara się zapobiec wojnie, lecz zostaje oskarżony o zdradę. Siedzący Byk staje w jego obronie, zwracając się do prezydenta Granta.

programme.title: Panhandle
programme.desc: John Sands, były szeryf z Teksasu, uciekinier w Meksyku, dowiaduje się o tajemniczym morderstwie brata Billy'ego. Pomimo nagrody za jego głowę, wraca do Panhandle, by odkryć prawdę i znaleźć zabójcę.

programme.title: Strzelaj Gringo... Strzelaj!
programme.desc: Meksykański właściciel ziemski Gutierrez oferuje uratowanie zbiegłego banity Chada Starka przed powieszeniem, jeśli Stark zgodzi się odnaleźć i zwrócić zbiegłego syna Gutierreza, Fidela. Stark wkrótce odnajduje Fidela, który przyłączył się do bandy banitów prowadzonej przez byłego znajomego Starka, Charliego Doneghana, nazywającego siebie teraz "Majorem".

programme.title: Co się zdarzyło w Silver Lode?
programme.desc: W dniu ślubu Dan Ballard zostaje aresztowany przez rzekomego szeryfa, który oskarża go o morderstwo i kradzież. Mimo zaprzeczeń Ballarda, mieszkańcy Silver Lode zaczynają wątpić w jego niewinność. Walcząc z narastającą nieufnością, Dan musi sam dowieść prawdy i oczyścić swoje imię.

programme.title: Generał Custer
programme.desc: Generał Custer - Miłość George'a Armstronga Custera do bohaterskich tradycji Kalwarii i niechęć do nadchodzącej industrializacji doprowadziły go do przeznaczenia pod Little Big Horn.

programme.title: Pojedynek w słońcu
programme.desc: Po egzekucji ojca Pearl Chavez trafia do rodziny w Teksasie. Miła Laura Belle i uczciwy Jesse ją przyjmują, lecz surowy senator McCanles i namiętny Lewt tworzą napięcie, które prowadzi do dramatycznych wydarzeń w ranczu.

programme.title: Nagroda Jest Twoja... Człowiek Mój
programme.desc: Grupa zabójców poszukuje rewolwerowca El Puro, by zdobyć 10 000 dolarów nagrody.

programme.title: Degueyo
programme.desc: Bandyci Ramona atakują Danger City w pogoni za skarbem. Mordują lub porywają mężczyzn, a kobiety i dzieci stają w obliczu groźby „Deguello”. Czterech mężczyzn, tropiących Ramona, decyduje się pomóc miastu w desperackiej obronie.

programme.title: Bohaterowie Fortu Worth
programme.desc: Podczas wojny secesyjnej, grupa konfederatów z pomocą Apaczy, próbuje zdobyć fort Unionistów, jednocześnie starając się uzyskać poparcie cesarza Meksyku Maksymiliana.

programme.title: Lola Colt - Twarzą w Twarz z El Diablo
programme.desc: Tancerka z saloonu Lola wraz z innymi tancerkami przybywa do miasteczka Sant'Anna. Miasteczko jest terroryzowane przez El Diablo, banitę, który chce sprzedać okoliczne ziemie przedsiębiorstwu kolejowemu. Wraz z Rodem, młodzieńcem, który się w niej zakochał, Lola pomaga kolonistom w buncie.

programme.title: Ramon - Meksykanin
programme.desc: Esmerelda zostaje zaatakowana, a jej brat Juan Morales ginie, co wywołuje konflikt rodzinny. Bandziory pod wodzą Ramona Morales napadają na ranczo, zabijając ojca i porywając Esmereldę. Slim Baxter mimo próśb matki podejmuje walkę o zemstę i sprawiedliwość.

programme.title: Dzikie Rewolwery
programme.desc: Okrutny i bezwzględny bandyta zabija właściciela tawerny, który wydał go władzom.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 48, 49
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Django i Sartana: Przeklęty poranek
programme.desc: Ciche miasteczko Black City żyje w strachu przed bandą Buda Willera. Młody szeryf Jack Ronson chce to zmienić. W walce o sprawiedliwość wspiera go milczący, ale skuteczny łowca nagród – Django.

programme.title: Wagon Trail
programme.desc: The son of Sheriff Clay Hartley, of the frontier town Elder, has gotten into bad company and hangs out with an outlaw gang in which, Collins, owner of the Golden Rule Saloon, is the secret head. Sheriff Hartley suspects him, but has been unable to gather the needed evidence. Collins instructs his gang, including young Hartley, to hold up the stagecoach on its return trip from Missionary Flats and take the cargo of gold dust it is carrying. Sheriff Hartley is notified of the planned holdup by one of his deputies who has been spying on Collins, and organizes a posse. A deputy-sheriff is killed in the ensuing gunfight between the lawmen and the outlaws, but Deputy Joe Larkin, pursues and...

programme.title: Brothers of the West
programme.desc: Tom Tyler plays Tom Wade, a range detective whose brother has been accused of robbery and murder. Wade has only one clue to prove his brothers innocence: a set of unusual tire tracks. This film was directed by Sam Katzman, who later became known as Jungle Sam for his association with a variety of jungle thrillers, and then as a master of all exploitation genres, from teen horror to flying saucer flicks!

programme.title: Phantom Ranger
programme.desc: Cowboy hero Tim McCoy stars as Tim Hayes, a two-fisted G-Man working for the FBI on a counterfeit money case. The incredibly daring Hayes infiltrates a gang that has kidnapped a Treasury Department engraver. Under the direction of Poverty Row icon Sam Newfield, McCoy turns in another of his legendary slam-bang performances, making Phantom Ranger a perennial favorite of B-Western fans.

programme.title: Fugitive of the Plains
programme.desc: In this continuation of the much loved Billy the Kid serials featuring dreamboat Buster Crabbe (perhaps best known for his numerous appearances as Flash Gordon in the 30s and 40s), Billy finds himself joining an outlaw band led by women in order to, once again, clear his name after being wrongly accused of a crime he did not commit. Helmed by famed B-movie director Sam Newfield, this film also features Al St. John, whose lovable Fuzzy character was as essential to the PRC's Billy the Kid series as Billy himself.

programme.title: Gunsmoke Ranch
programme.desc: Flagg is relocating flood victims to Gunsmoke Ranch. The Three Mesquiteers know Flagg to be a crook and try to warn them. They ignore the warning and improve the land only to find that it has been condemned for a new dam.

programme.title: Neath Canadian Skies
programme.desc: It's the mounties versus claim jumpers in this drama from Golden Gate Pictures. Based on an action-packed novel by James Oliver Curwood and directed by B. Reeves Maynard (Undersea Kingdom, The Phantom Empire), the film features an outstanding cast of Poverty Row regulars, including Russell Hayden, Inez Cooper, Cliff Nazarro, I. Stanford Jolley, and Kermit Maynard. For movie buffs: Cinematographer Marcel Le Picard began his career in the silent era and finished with exactly 200 credits!

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After Farmer Perkins murders a store clerk in front of his wife, and is allowed to walk after his trial, the Cartwright's step in to make sure he'll be rearrested, tried, and hung.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After the Virginia City bank is robbed by an outlaw gang, the gangs youngest member gets a job on the Ponderosa. Initially welcomed, Little Joe becomes suspicious of Ponderosas newest member.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After a U.S. deputy marshal saves Adam's life from two gunmen, he explains that he is in town to bring a close friend of the Cartwright's to San Francisco to testify in a statewide racketeering trial, but the Deputy Marshal's motives for the witness soon become suspicious.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort. From 1960.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: With Tom Edwards ranch going to waste since his becoming a paraplegic following an accident with Ben, Ben makes a business proposition: The Cartwrights will build a mill on Edwards land. In return, Ben requests that he earn his investment money back as well as fifteen percent. The deal is made, but suspicions of Edwards accident bring tension to Ponderosa and put their agreement at risk.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Adam tags along with a wagon train of Quakers passing through town as he is interested in the leaders daughter. Someone, however, intends to take the gold being carried in the wagon train, putting everyone in danger.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza

This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Tulsa
programme.desc: Susan Hayward stars in this dramatic tale of the Oklahoma oil boom. She plays Cherokee Lansing, a determined young woman out to protect her father's honor after he's killed by men from a competing oil company. With a cast that includes Robert Preston, Ed Begley, and Pedro Armendariz, this engaging picture from producer Walter Wanger (Cleopatra, I Want to Live!) was nominated for an Academy Award in the Special Effects category. Also, listen for veteran character actor Chill Wills as the narrator!

programme.title: Over the Hill Gang
programme.desc: A retired Texas Ranger and his three aging pals are hired to clean up a lawless town. Starring Walter Brennan, Edgar Buchanan, Andy Devine, Jack Elam, Gypsy Rose Lee, and Rick Nelson.

programme.title: Sagebrush Trail
programme.desc: John Wayne plays a man wrongly convicted of murder in this exciting western drama from Lone Star Pictures. You'll enjoy plenty of gun action and thundering hoofbeats as he escapes from jail and then joins a gang, hoping to find the real killer! Director Armand Schaefer (The Miracle Rider, The Lost Jungle) whips up some fine performances from a cast of B-movie favorites, including Lane Chandler (Samson and Delilah) and the great stunt rider, Yakima Canutt. And of course, the film features plenty of fight scenes, made memorable by John Wayne's big swinging' right fist! For film buffs: This was one of 11 films Wayne starred in that year, making 1933 one of the busiest years of Wayne's...

programme.title: Santa Fe Trail
programme.desc: Oscar winner Michael Curtiz (Casablanca, Mildred Pierce) directed this exciting drama about Army officer Jeb Stuart and the days leading up to the Civil War. Errol Flynn (The Adventures of Robin Hood) stars as Stuart, with Olivia de Havilland as his romantic interest (the seventh of nine times they were paired together by Warner Bros.) The cast includes Ronald Reagan as General George Custer, and Raymond Massey as John Brown, with such familiar faces as Alan Hale and Van Hefflin in supporting roles. Filmed partly in Santa Fe!

programme.title: Doomed Caravan
programme.desc: Hoppy is enlisted to help protect Jane Travers' next caravan against robbers who have been terrorizing travelers. He comes across a wily pair of thieves who hve their men disguised as soldiers to escort the caravan. Hoppy isn't fooled for a second and busts up their plan with help from the Bar 20 boys. Not to be outdone, the thieves then capture everyone but Hoppy and puts them before a firing squad. Not it's up to Hoppy to rescue his friends singlehandedly. The cast includes William Boyd as Hopalong Cassidy, with Russell Hayden and Andy Clyde as Luky Jenkins and California Jack. For those counting, this was the 32nd of 66 Hopalong Cassidy adventures. They would be edited for syndication...

programme.title: Across the Plains
programme.desc: Savagery! Murder! Renegade white men on the lawless frontier! Two young brothers are separated when their wagon train is attacked and their parents are killed. One brother is raised by Indians. The other falls in with a band of outlaws. Later, the brothers meet up on opposite sides of a battle. Addison Randall, Glenn Strange, and Hal Price star in this rugged tale from Monogram Pictures.

programme.title: Diamond Trail
programme.desc: Diamond Trail is an epic that starts in the speeding taxicabs and illegal barrooms of the east coast, and travels west for its exciting climax. Reporter Speed Morgan (Rex Bell), going undercover as Frisco Eddy, infiltrates Flash Barrett's gang in order to bring them all to justice. But can he get the job done before they learn his identity? With a cast that includes Frances Rich and Bud Osborne, this action tale from director Harry L. Fraser (The Last of the Clintons) is another forgotten classic from Monogram Pictures.

programme.title: Fighting Fury
programme.desc: A THRILLING TALE OF REVENGE AND REDEMPTION! Based on the story Triple Cross for Danger by the widely lauded Western author Walter J. Coburn, Fighting Fury is a thrilling take on the Western revenge drama. Portraying both a father and his son, star of silent and sound cowboy adventure films, Jack Hoxie (Trouble Busters, Law and Lawless) exudes the classic American rustic charm that still defines the genre. The film spins the yarn of Clay Hill Jr. (Hoxie), a Spanish-American boy raised by a Mexican servant who vows bloody vengeance on three malicious ranchers after they murder his parents and turn his life upside down. Featuring fine supporting performances from genre heavies Helen Holmes,...

programme.title: The Dude Ranger
programme.desc: Its nothing but action and thrills when an Easterner inherits a cattle ranch and discovers that thousands of cattle have been stolen. Secretly, he signs on as a hired hand at his own ranch to uncover the thief. Once he realizes whats going on, the city boy becomes a hard-riding, avenging son of a six- shooter! Directed by Edward F. Cline from a story by Zane Grey, the film stars George OBrien, Irene Hervey, and LeRoy Mason.

programme.title: Hellgate (Edited Version)
programme.desc: In 1867 Kansas, veterinarian Sterling Hayden treats an injured stranger who turns out to have been a guerrilla raider--and Hayden soon finds himself serving a term in one of the world's most terrifying prisons under sadistic commandant Ward Bond. Adapted from the story of Dr. Mudd, the physician who attended John Wilkes Booth, assassin of President Lincoln.

programme.title: The Hanged Man
programme.desc: After a condemned gunfighter (Steve Forrest) survives his own hanging, he helps a young widow stop a pitiless land baron from taking her ranch. This television feature boasts a strong cast of recognizable characters, including Will Geer, Sharon Acker, Dean Jagger, BarBara Luna, and Cameron Mitchell. Director Michael Caffey would go on to work on such hit shows as Barnaby Jones and MacGyver. Also, look for John Mitchum, younger brother of Robert, in a small role. This movie originally aired on ABC-TV and was considered the pilot for a possible series. Writer/producer Andrew Fenady was behind several opular TV shows such as Branded and The Rebel, as well as the 1970 John Wayne feature, Chisum.

programme.title: Cry Blood Apache (Edited Version)
programme.desc: An Apache brave seeks vengeance on a band of sadistic gold hunters in this bloody drive-in western. Pitcalin (Jody McRae) leads the marauders who wipe out an Apache camp when they discover gold, only to watch their violent deeds lead to their own demise. Featuring a superb cast that also includes Dan Kemp, Robert Tessier, and Joel McRae, this coldblooded western tale was directed by character actor and filmmaker Jack Starrett (Cleopatra Jones, The Losers).

programme.title: The Dawn Rider
programme.desc: John Wayne was still a few years from major stardom when he appeared as John Mason, a man seeking revenge for his fathers murder. Marion Burns stars as Alice, Masons love interest, while Reed Howes stars as Masons friend and rival for Alices affection. When Mason finally tracks down the man responsible for his fathers death, will Ben help, or stand in his way? Produced by Lone Star Pictures, the group behind many of Waynes early films, The Dawn Rider is a stirring yarn about the price of vengeance.

programme.title: The Outlaw
programme.desc: Billy the Kid, Pat Garrett, and Doc Holliday ride again in Howard Hughes' epic 1943 western, but the character you'll remember most is sultry country vixen Rio McDonald. Hughes' nationwide search for an actress to play Rio resulted in the film debut of Jane Russell, whose natural assets were allegedly helped by a special bra designed by Hughes. When The Outlaw finally received a nationwide release in 1946, its success vindicated Hughes and made Russell a star. As for Hughes' infamous bra, Russell said in her 1988 memoir, I never wore it, and he never knew.

programme.title: Outpost In Morocco
programme.desc: George Raft, Mary Windsor, and Akim Tamiroff star in this romantic drama from director Robert Florey (The Florentine Dagger, Daughter of Shanghai). Raft plays Capt. Gerard, a member of the Foreign Legion known for his romantic entanglements. He's assigned to escort an emir's daughter to her father's mountain citadel and learn about the emir's activities. Not surprisingly, Gerard finds trouble brewing! With footage shot in Morocco, this movie also features a beautiful musical score by twotime Oscar nominee Michel Michelet (Voice in the Wind).

programme.title: Law of the Pampas
programme.desc: Murder below the Equator...and Hopalong Cassidy races to action in the heart of the wild Pampas country !Hoppy (William Boyd) and his pal Lucky (Russell Hayden) head to South America to look after a herd of cattle sold by Cassidy's boss to an Argentine rancher. Unfortunately, the scoundrel Ralph Merritt (Sidney Blackmer) wants the cattle, and he's not above hiring some dangerous characters to do his dirty work. It's a test of blazing guns...under a blazing sun! Can the boys of Bar 20 lay down the law in a lawless place like the Pampas? Can Hoppy and his gang succeed in what is truly a last frontier? Watch and see!

programme.title: The Fighting Redhead
programme.desc: When a rustler named Faro kills one of his own henchmen and blames it on Sheila O'Conner, Red and Little Beaver set out to clear Sheila and to find evidence against Faro and his gang.

programme.title: A Lust to Kill
programme.desc: An imprisoned outlaw escapes and goes on the hunt for his brothers murderers, who just happen to be members of the outlaws own gang. He and his beloved hit the trail, but are pursued by local law enforcement, who have their own plans for justice. Starring Don Megowan, Jim Davis, and Allison Hayes.

programme.title: Arizona Thunderbolt
programme.desc: When Sue Bixby becomes his new boss, stagecoach robber Talbot reforms and goes after her rustled cattle. When he and his men are outnumbered fighting Lloyd's gang, Randall rides to get circus man Mahoney and his man shooting cannon.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In General Delivery, the G-men crack a government swindle. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men

In the nearby town of Bender, a group of shady locals believe the settlers should be stripped of their rights and take the matter to court. When it looks like the judge is going to rule for the gypsies, the outlaws kidnap him and lock him in the local jail.

Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook come across a girl in the woods who is running away from a man named Stark. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben Cartwright gives a strip of fertile farming land to an Indian who had previously saved Bens life. Things take a deadly turn, however, when the land ends up being next to a very racist farmer.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Days of Jesse James
programme.desc: Famed American western actor and singer Roy Rogers once again plays himself in this Jesse James tale that's a twist on the familiar formula. When he is summoned to bring Jesse to justice after the known villain is suspected of a bank robbery, Rogers soon discovers that Jesse has been framed and that the owner of the bank has robbed his own bank posing as Jesse. Fast-paced and fun, this classic Roy Rogers western directed by Joseph Kane (Dakota) features a whole host of original songs sung by the great Rogers himself.

programme.title: Frontier Justice
programme.desc: Hoot Gibson is back! But he never imagined he'd find his father in an insane asylum and his cattle ranch overrun with sheep! Worst of all, Roger Williams stars as the diabolical James WIlton, a rival who isn't above murder. For trivia buffs: Director Robert F. McGowan was the man behind several of the classic Our Gang comedies...

programme.title: Hands Across The Border
programme.desc: Roy Rogers and Trigger star in this Republic Pictures western about horse breeders vying for a contract with the U.S. Army. The cast also includes such favorites as Onslow Stevens and Guinn Big Boy Williams, while songs include Hey Hey (It's a Great Day), Dreaming to Music, and The Girl with the High Button Shoes. For movie buffs: The music for the title song, Hands Across the Border, was composed by none other than Hoagy Carmichael!

programme.title: Colorado
programme.desc: Theres trouble out west! Its the Civil War and the Union needs troops back east to defend itself. Roy Rogers stars as Lieutenant Jerry Burke, who is sent to investigate why the returning troops are being stalled in Colorado. Also starring Gabby Hayes, Pauline Moore, and Milburn Stone, this film is action packed with a turn you wont see coming!

programme.title: Hurricane Horseman
programme.desc: Pancho Gomez kidnaps Don Roberto and his daughter, Tonita for ransom. Can an undercover lawman named Gun Smith save the pair, or will he be caught himself?! Smith gets a job in Gomez's camp supposedly to repair their guns. Instead he fixes the guns so they will misfire. When Gomez refuses to let him go, he sends his horse for the Sheriff! This campy western from 1931 stars Lane Chandler and is sure to keep you enthralled from beginning to end. Directed by Armand Schaefer; starring Marie Quillan and Walter Miller.

programme.title: Way of the West
programme.desc: Government agent Gordon (Hal Taliaferro) goes undercover to investigate an ongoing war between cattlemen and sheepmen. But he soon finds himself framed for murder! This low budget western from the short-lived Empire Pictures is from the golden era of shoot em ups, when audiences knew who the bad guys were, and couldnt wait for the good guys to serve up some just punishment!

programme.title: Hell Town
programme.desc: In Hell Town (aka Born to the West) John Wayne is back in the saddle as two-fisted Dare Rudd, a roaming cowhand trying to prove he can win a woman's love and outwit a crooked saloon owner. This exciting B-movie from Paramount Pictures was based on a novel by western writer Zane Grey. With a wild and wooly cast that includes Johnny Mack Brown, Marsha Hunt, Monte Blue, and Lucian Littlefield, director Charles Barton (Abbott and Costello Meet Frankenstein) gives us a tale of romance, action, and high stakes gambling!

programme.title: Uuu! Halloween Madei
programme.desc: Aby uniknąć kłopotów w wigilię Wszystkich Świętych, Madea i jej paczka zostają w domu, aby mieć oko na nastoletnią córkę Briana. Ale kiedy nadchodzi godzina czarownic, rozpętuje się piekło.

programme.title: Fantastyczny Pan Lis
programme.desc: Pan i Pani Lis prowadzą szczęśliwe życie ze swoim ekscentrycznym synem Ashem. Wszystko się zmienia, kiedy Pan Lis knuje intrygę by dokonać największej kradzieży kurczaków jaką widział zwierzęcy świat.

programme.title: Mój świąteczny hotelik
programme.desc: Gdy bizneswoman Jennifer dowiaduje się, że rodzice wyjeżdżają na Święta bez niej, postanawia porzucić życie w zabieganym San Francisco i odwiedzić hotelik swojej babci.

programme.title: Golden Shoes
programme.desc: Młody chłopak oddaje serce narodu, gdy pokonuje zastraszanie, nietolerancję i tragiczną sytuację domową, aby realizować swoje marzenie o grze w piłkę nożną.

programme.title: Heat - Gorączka
programme.desc: Neil McCauley (Robert De Niro), złodziej wysokiej rangi, wzbił się na szczyt kariery dzięki inteligencji, czujności oraz byciu nieuchwytnym. Detektyw Vince Hanna (Al Pacino) jest niezawodny w swoim fachu i tym razem wziął na swój cel McCauleya.

programme.title: Zaginiona dziewczyna
programme.desc: ZAGINIONA DZIEWCZYNA - w reżyserii Davida Finchera i oparta na światowym bestsellerze Gillian Flynn - ujawnia tajemnice skrywane przez współczesne małżeństwo.

programme.title: Zjawa
programme.desc: Hugh Glass zostaje zaatakowany przez niedźwiedzia. Ledwo żywy, pozostawiony na pewną śmierć, wbrew wszystkiemu stara się przeżyć. Zmagając się z bezlitosnymi zimowymi warunkami, desperacko brnie przez dzikie tereny, gnany miłością do rodziny i nieokiełznaną żądzą zemsty.

programme.title: Deadfall
programme.desc: Przygotujcie się na gęstą sieć uwodzenia, zdrady, zabójstwa i chciwości w ekscytującym thrillerze z udziałem Michaela Biehna, Jamesa Coburna i Nicolasa Cage'a.

programme.title: The Negotiator
programme.desc: Danny Roman, biegły policyjny negocjator, chce oczyścić się z fałszywych zarzutów, więc przetrzymuje grupę zakładników w biurowcu, by zyskać czas potrzebny na odkrycie prawdy. Chris Sabian, tytułowy „Negocjator”, podejmuje próbę rozładowania sytuacji i zaangażowania Romana.

programme.title: Marmaduke - pies na fali
programme.desc: Ekranizacja sławnej, długo nadawanego komiksu o wielkim psie o imieniu Marmaduke

programme.title: Piąty wymiar
programme.desc: Sztorm wywraca jacht z grupą przyjaciół na pokładzie. Przepływający statek pasażerski, który jest dla nich jedyną szansą schronienia, okazuje się opustoszały.

programme.title: Summoned
programme.desc: Po latach ktoś lub coś zabija członków ławy przysięgłych (Cuba Gooding Jr., Ashley Scott), którzy wydawali wyrok podczas najgłośniejszej sprawy seryjnego zabójcy z San Francisco.

programme.title: Lekarstwo na życie
programme.desc: Młody mężczyzna przybywa do sielankowego spa w szwajcarskich Aplach, aby zabrać stamtąd swojego szefa. Mężczyzna szybko odkrywa, że cudowne leczenie skrywa mroczny sekret.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Acrimony
programme.desc: Wierna żona jest rozwścieczona krętactwami swego męża, gdy staje się jasne, że ją zdradził.

programme.title: Szalone Wesele 2
programme.desc: Druga córka Wasilija chce wyjść za mąż. Ojciec protestuje przeciwko jej wyborowi i próbuje nie dopuścić do ślubu.

programme.title: Ad Astra
programme.desc: Paranoiczny thriller w kosmosie, który podąża za Royem McBride'em w misji przez bezlitosny układ słoneczny, aby odkryć prawdę o jego zaginionym ojcu i jego skazanej na wyprawę wyprawie, która teraz, 30 lat później, zagraża wszechświatowi.

programme.title: Ilu miałaś facetów?
programme.desc: Ally Darling jest zaniepokojona po przeczytaniu artykułu w gazecie, według którego ludzie, którzy mieli 20 lub więcej partnerów zaprzepaścili szansę na znalezienie prawdziwej miłości.

programme.title: Where's the Money?
programme.desc: W tej skandalicznie śmiesznej komedii Del, sprytny młodzieniec wychowany na ulicach South Central Los Angeles, dowiaduje się, że jego osadzony ojciec wraz z wujkiem, który właśnie wyszedł na wolność (Terry Crews), ukradli milion dolarów i pieniądze ukryli w piwnicy noclegowni.

programme.title: Awake
programme.desc: Podczas operacji zamożny młody mężczyzna doświadcza świadomości śródoperacyjnej i odkrywa, że zespół operacyjny chciał go zamordować.

programme.title: Klub samotnych mam
programme.desc: Grupa samotnych matek z różnych środowisk łączy się i tworzy grupę wsparcia, gdzie mogą omówić swoje problemy, znaleźć radość w przeszkodach życiowych i wykorzystać swoją wewnętrzną siłę, aby pokonać osobiste wyzwania.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Michael Myers zostaje wypuszczony ze szpitala psychiatrycznego, w którym przebywał przez 17 lat, i rozpoczyna szał, aby odnaleźć swoją młodszą siostrę. Nikt nie jest bezpieczny. Remake filmu z 1978 roku w reżyserii Johna Carpentera.

programme.title: Big Short
programme.desc: Oparta na prawdziwych wydarzeniach historia czterech outsiderów, którzy zobaczyli to, czego nie chciały widzieć wielkie banki, media i rząd: upadek światowej gospodarki. Śmiała inwestycja prowadzi ich w mroczne meandry bankowości, gdzie wszystko jest podejrzane.

programme.title: A ty myślałeś; że twoi rodzice są dziwni!
programme.desc: Sympatyczny robot imieniem Newman zabierze Josha i Maxa na najbardziej fantastyczną przygodę ich życia.

programme.title: Intersections
programme.desc: Małżeństwo spędzające miesiąc miodowy w Maroku przeżywa śmiertelny wypadek samochodowy na środku pustyni.

programme.title: Święta jak malowane
programme.desc: Dla doświadczającej trudności malarki Heidi Neill Boże Narodzenie w Nowym Jorku nie są wcale cudowne.

programme.title: Awake
programme.desc: Podczas operacji zamożny młody mężczyzna doświadcza świadomości śródoperacyjnej i odkrywa, że zespół operacyjny chciał go zamordować.

programme.title: Snajperzy
programme.desc: Podczas wojny antyjapońskiej Yang Haotian, żołnierz Nowej 4. Armii, prowadzi swoich poległych towarzyszy z powrotem do swojej jednostki, gdy spotyka Qin Yu, oficera wywiadu nacjonalistycznego, ściganego przez Japończyków w Lost Cloud Ridge.

programme.title: Pajac za burtą
programme.desc: Młody komik, któremu się nie wiedzie, podejmuje się pracy fizycznej na wycieczkowcu, gdzie ma nadzieję złapać wiatr w żagle i zrobić karierę w przemyśle rozrywkowym.

programme.title: The Condemned 2
programme.desc: Łowca nagród bierze udział w turnieju, którego uczestnicy zmuszani są do walki o przetrwanie. W tej emocjonującej kontynuacji filmu Potępiony występują mega gwiazda WWE Randy Orton oraz Eric Roberts.

programme.title: The Dog Who Saved Easter
programme.desc: To od Zeusa i jego nowych przyjaciół zależy ocalenie Wielkanocy, którą niemal niweczy stare i nowe poczucie zemsty.

programme.title: Golden Shoes
programme.desc: Młody chłopak oddaje serce narodu, gdy pokonuje zastraszanie, nietolerancję i tragiczną sytuację domową, aby realizować swoje marzenie o grze w piłkę nożną.

programme.title: Zaginiona dziewczyna
programme.desc: ZAGINIONA DZIEWCZYNA - w reżyserii Davida Finchera i oparta na światowym bestsellerze Gillian Flynn - ujawnia tajemnice skrywane przez współczesne małżeństwo.

programme.title: The Negotiator
programme.desc: Danny Roman, biegły policyjny negocjator, chce oczyścić się z fałszywych zarzutów, więc przetrzymuje grupę zakładników w biurowcu, by zyskać czas potrzebny na odkrycie prawdy. Chris Sabian, tytułowy „Negocjator”, podejmuje próbę rozładowania sytuacji i zaangażowania Romana.

programme.title: Czas zabijania
programme.desc: Stare nawyki ciężko wykorzenić... Zwłaszcza na zmieniającym się południu USA. Carl Lee Hailey, pracownik fabryki w Mississippi dowiaduje się tego, gdy jego dziesięcioletnia siostra zostaje brutalnie napadnięta przez dwóch pijanych rasistów.

programme.title: Fantastyczny Pan Lis
programme.desc: Pan i Pani Lis prowadzą szczęśliwe życie ze swoim ekscentrycznym synem Ashem. Wszystko się zmienia, kiedy Pan Lis knuje intrygę by dokonać największej kradzieży kurczaków jaką widział zwierzęcy świat.
